DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety EPA ( Eicosapentaenoic Acid ) alone VitE diabetic patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effects EPA Vitamin E Leptin , Adiponectin Enzymatic Antioxidants Type 2 DM
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group study design After 12weeks , subject type II DM randomize receive either 2000 mg pearl EPA per day plus double-blinded matching placebo ( 1 corn oil pearl per day ) 12 week OR 400 mg VitE pearl plus double-blinded per day plus double-blinded matching placebo ( 4 corn oil pearl per day ) 12 week OR 2000 mg pearl EPA per day plus double-blinded matching 400 mg VitE pearl OR placebo ( 4corn oil pearl per day plus 1 corn oil pearl per day ) 12 weeks.The total dose EPA pearl 2000 mg per day ( EPA match placebo corn oil dose remain 4 pearls per day ) The total dose VitE pearl 400 mg per day ( VitE match placebo corn oil dose remain 1 pearls per day ) .
DOC.criteria: DM Type II . Antidiabetic drug therapy stop . History DM 215 year . Age 3055 year . No History circulatory , thyroid , pulmonary , liver , kidney , cancer . DM Type I. Nephropathy . Retinopathy . Cancer . Thyroid disease . Renal failure . pulmonary disease MI . CHD . Liver disease ,
